sc.server.gaming

Class GameRoomManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • sc.server.gaming.GameRoomManager

  • public class GameRoomManager
extends java.lang.Object
    The GameManager is responsible to keep all games alive and kill them once they are done. Additionally the GameManger has to detect and kill games, which seem to be dead-locked or have caused a timeout.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GameRoomManager()
      Default constructor, initializes rooms, loads available plugins

                    throws RescuableClientException

        Parameters:
        gameType - String of current Game
        Returns:
        Newly created GameRoom
        Throws:
        RescuableClientException - if creation of game failed

      • createGame

        public GameRoom createGame(java.lang.String gameType,
                           boolean prepared)
                    throws RescuableClientException
        make new PluginManager, generate roomId, create Game and GameRoom. If gameFile is set, load gameState from file
        Parameters:
        gameType - String of current Game
        prepared - signals whether the game was prepared by gui or ..., false if player has to send JoinRoomRequest
        Returns:
        newly created GameRoom
        Throws:
        RescuableClientException - if Plugin could not be loaded

      • createAndJoinGame

        public GameRoomMessage createAndJoinGame(Client client,
                                         java.lang.String gameType)
                                  throws RescuableClientException
        Open new GameRoom and join Client
        Parameters:
        client - Client to join the game
        gameType - String of current game
        Returns:
        GameRoomMessage for new GameRoom, null im unsuccessful
        Throws:
        RescuableClientException - if game could not be created

      • joinOrCreateGame

        public GameRoomMessage joinOrCreateGame(Client client,
                                        java.lang.String gameType)
                                 throws RescuableClientException
        Called after JoinRoomRequest. Client joins already existing GameRoom or opens new one
        Parameters:
        client - to join the game
        gameType - String of current game
        Returns:
        GameRoomMessage with roomId an success null if unsuccessful
        Throws:
        RescuableClientException - if client could not join room

      • prepareGame

        public PrepareGameProtocolMessage prepareGame(java.lang.String gameType,
                                              java.util.List<SlotDescriptor> descriptors,
                                              java.lang.Object loadGameInfo)
                                       throws RescuableClientException
        Creates a new GameRoom createGame, set descriptors of PlayerSlots, if exists load state of game from file
        Parameters:
        gameType - String of current game
        descriptors - which are displayName, canTimeout and shouldBePaused
        loadGameInfo - Object for game information
        Returns:
        new PrepareGameProtocolMessage with roomId and slots
        Throws:
        RescuableClientException - if game could not be created

      • prepareGame

        public PrepareGameProtocolMessage prepareGame(PrepareGameRequest prepared)
                                       throws RescuableClientException
        Calls prepareGame
        Parameters:
        prepared - PrepareGameRequest with gameType and slotsDescriptors
        Returns:
        ProtocolMessage from server
        Throws:
        RescuableClientException - if room could not be created

      • addResultToScore

        public void addResultToScore(GameResult result,
                             java.util.List<PlayerScore> playerScores,
                             java.lang.String name1,
                             java.lang.String name2)
                      throws InvalidScoreDefinitionException
        Called by gameRoom after game ended and test mode enabled to save results in playerScores
        Parameters:
        result - GameResult
        playerScores - List of playerScores
        name1 - displayName of player1
        name2 - displayName of player2
        Throws:
        InvalidScoreDefinitionException - if scoreDefinitions do not match
